content.description: The content of the docker-compose.yml to write if not exist.

eof.description: Inherited from nikita.file use when writing docker-compose.yml file.

backup.description:
Create a backup, append a provided string to the filename extension or
a timestamp if value is not a string, only apply if the target file
exists and is modified.

force.description:
Force to re-create the containers if the config and image have not
changed.

target.description:
The docker-compose.yml absolute's file's path, required if no content
is specified.
